## What is AceReader Pro 8?
 
AceReader Pro 8 is a software that helps you improve your reading speed and comprehension by training your eyes and brain to process text more efficiently. It uses the Rapid Serial Visual Presentation (RSVP) technique, which flashes words on the screen one at a time at a controlled speed. This way, you can eliminate subvocalization (the habit of pronouncing words in your head) and regression (the habit of going back to previous words) that slow down your reading.
 
AceReader Pro 8 also offers various modes of reading, such as tachistoscope (flashing words in groups), vertical reader (scrolling text vertically), horizontal reader (scrolling text horizontally), and eye span (expanding your peripheral vision). You can choose the mode that suits your preference and goal.
 
Additionally, AceReader Pro 8 provides you with hundreds of exercises, tests, and games that cover different topics and genres. You can also import your own text files or web pages to practice with. AceReader Pro 8 tracks your progress and gives you feedback on your speed, comprehension, and eye movements.
